name: A Ribbitting Tale
description:
A puzzle game where you control a green frog trying to reach a pink frog.

Navigate the map avoiding enemies and use special powers acquired from plants to solve puzzles.

Made in 2 weeks for the IVGD 2022 Winter FrogJam.

(Download recommended. If playing web version, scroll down and use full screen mode for a better experience.)

WASD - Move
Space- Shoot (needs a flower)
Backspace - Undo
R - Reset
Esc - Quit to menu
Q & E - Rotate camera
